fr.liglab.adele.icasa.location

Interface ZonePropListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IcasaListener
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    MultiEventListener, ZoneListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UPnPPhotometerProxyImpl

    public interface ZonePropListener
extends IcasaListener
    Listener of zone variables
    Author:
    Thomas Leveque

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void zoneVariableAdded(Zone zone, String variableName)
      Called callback when a variable is added in a zone.
      void zoneVariableModified(Zone zone, String variableName, Object oldValue)
      Called callback when a variable has been modified.
      void zoneVariableRemoved(Zone zone, String variableName)
      Called callback when a variable is removed from a zone.

    • Method Detail

      • zoneVariableAdded

        void zoneVariableAdded(Zone zone,
                     String variableName)
        Called callback when a variable is added in a zone.
        Parameters:
        zone - the zone where the variable was added.
        variableName - the name of variable added.

      • zoneVariableRemoved

        void zoneVariableRemoved(Zone zone,
                       String variableName)
        Called callback when a variable is removed from a zone.
        Parameters:
        zone - The zone where the variable was removed.
        variableName - The name of variable removed.

      • zoneVariableModified

        void zoneVariableModified(Zone zone,
                        String variableName,
                        Object oldValue)
        Called callback when a variable has been modified.
        Parameters:
        zone - The zone where the variable was modified.
        variableName - The name of variable modified.
        oldValue - The previous value of the variable.
